title: T is for Tumbleweed
creator_credit: Louis Clyde Stoumen, James A. Lebenthal and Camera Eye Pictures
brief_description: Portrays without commentary the racing, creeping, leaping travels of a tumbleweed and the encounters it has with people, animals and things. Photographed by Haskell Wexler.
creator_credit_for_label: Louis Clyde Stoumen, James A. Lebenthal and Camera Eye Pictures
